metadata.name: Beowulf: The Graphic Novel
metadata.description: Before The Lord of the Rings, before Conan - there was Beowulf! The Viking warrior must defeat the ogre Grendel and his vengeful mother before facing the fire-breathing dragon that will spell his doom. Ready yourself for this winter's blockbuster film with this stunning graphic novel that captures the power and majesty of the greatest sword and sorcery hero of them all! Available in softcover and Collector's Edition hardcover editions.
